author: Matt Bassil
description:
Horned, hellish, and hella charismatic, the DnD Tiefling 5e species are a humanoid race which shares DNA with devils and demons. While they have some common features (horns, tails, colorful skin), the different Tiefling subraces can have hugely varied ancestries and abilities.

Continue reading DnD Tiefling 5e - the full species guide
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: DnD Tiefling 5e - the full species guide

author: Matt Bassil
description:
Oh god, no. Please no. Tell me there’s been a mistake. Tell me the Giratina and Darkrai deck hasn’t wormed its way back into the Pokémon Pocket meta! We haven’t had another big Ursiiday tournament yet to confirm it, but looking at the standings for smaller tournaments over the past week, it’s undeniable - this duo is back and more toxic than ever before.

Continue reading Pokémon Pocket's evil Giratina Darkrai deck is back, and worse than ever!
MORE FROM WARGAMER: How many Pokémon are there?, How to play Pokémon cards, Rare Pokémon cards
title: Pokémon Pocket's evil Giratina Darkrai deck is back, and worse than ever!

author: Chloe Ward
description:
Cue the John Williams music and grab your light-sabers, because there are some fantastic Star Wars Lego sets on the horizon. Join me as I cover my living room in sand – for that authentic Tatooine aesthetic – and run down the most exciting new Star Wars Lego sets releasing, or up for pre-order, in July.

Continue reading Three unmissable new Lego Star Wars sets to buy in July 2025
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Biggest LEGO sets, LEGO sets for adults, Best Star Wars LEGO sets
title: Three unmissable new Lego Star Wars sets to buy in July 2025

author: Alex Evans
description:
Genericization is the term for when a specific named brand becomes so successful and dominant in its field that it becomes the label for a whole category of products; think Q-Tip, Band-Aid, or (of course) Kleenex. And as Kleenex is to soft, paper moisture eaters, so Dungeons and Dragons is to tabletop RPGs.

Continue reading Daggerheart won't kill DnD - but in the long run, corporate complacency might
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: Daggerheart won't kill DnD - but in the long run, corporate complacency might

author: Timothy Linward
description:
This impressive Orc cosplay is the work of Shakhov Sagid, who created it “for a LARP game set in the Warhammer Fantasy universe” that will take place this August. It was a labour of love, and he was so chuffed with his work that he took it for its first outing a little ahead of schedule - the Maypole festival in Vyborg, a Russian town close to the Finnish border.

Continue reading What happens when a Warhammer Orc invades a May day festival?
title: What happens when a Warhammer Orc invades a May day festival?

author: Timothy Linward
description:
What's the ultimate Horus Heresy book order? We've read all 64 (and the rest) to create this full, annotated list of Games Workshop's epic series - complete with expert summaries of each novel, and a curated reading order for each Legion, so you can follow your favorites from the very beginning, right through to the Siege of Terra.

Continue reading The Warhammer 40k Horus Heresy book order, explained
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Warhammer 40k starter sets, Best Warhammer 40k games, All Warhammer 40k factions
title: The Warhammer 40k Horus Heresy book order, explained

author: Matt Bassil
description:
Power Conduit, an artifact MTG card from that artifact-heavy set, Mirridon, is currently spiking in value. Previously, the cheapest variant of this card cost $4, but since Final Fantasy came along it’s jumped up to $9.

Continue reading This obscure artifact MTG card from 2003 spiked in price by 125%
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: This obscure artifact MTG card from 2003 spiked in price by 125%

author: Timothy Linward
description:
Blood Rage, Eric Lang’s hit Viking board game, is finally getting a sequel, Blood Rage: Valhalla. New publisher Tabletop Tycoon has revealed that this standalone sequel to the 2015 original is in development, with a Gamefound campaign “launching soon”.

Continue reading Iconic Viking board game Blood Rage is getting a sequel
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best board games , Couples' board games, Board games for adults
title: Iconic Viking board game Blood Rage is getting a sequel
